languages.text: {n}Маражай с довольным смешком уклоняется от удара и подается назад.{/n} "Напрасно. Впрочем, неважно. Вернемся к твоим обязательствам".
{n}Marazhai dodges the blow with a smirk and draws back.{/n} "You should not have done that. But it does not matter. Let us return to your obligations."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай с довольным смешком уклоняется от удара и подается назад.{/n} "Напрасно. Впрочем, неважно. Вернемся к твоим обязательствам".

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋得意洋洋地笑着，躲开了这一击，朝后退去。{/n}“你真不该这么做。不过这并不重要，咱们来重新谈谈你的义务吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai dodges the blow with a smirk and draws back.{/n} "You should not have done that. But it does not matter. Let us return to your obligations."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋得意洋洋地笑着，躲开了这一击，朝后退去。{/n}“你真不该这么做。不过这并不重要，咱们来重新谈谈你的义务吧。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは攻撃を避けると、ニヤニヤ笑いながら一歩下がる。{/n}「悪手だな。だが、どうでもいい。お前の義務の話に戻ろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai dodges the blow with a smirk and draws back.{/n} "You should not have done that. But it does not matter. Let us return to your obligations."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは攻撃を避けると、ニヤニヤ笑いながら一歩下がる。{/n}「悪手だな。だが、どうでもいい。お前の義務の話に戻ろう」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai esquiva el golpe con una sonrisa burlona y retrocede.{/n} «No deberías haber hecho eso. Pero no importa. Volvamos a tus obligaciones».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai dodges the blow with a smirk and draws back.{/n} "You should not have done that. But it does not matter. Let us return to your obligations."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai esquiva el golpe con una sonrisa burlona y retrocede.{/n} «No deberías haber hecho eso. Pero no importa. Volvamos a tus obligaciones».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai esquive le coup avec un petit sourire et recule d'un pas.{/n} « Vous n'auriez pas dû faire une chose pareille. Mais c'est sans importance. Revenons-en plutôt à vos obligations envers moi. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai dodges the blow with a smirk and draws back.{/n} "You should not have done that. But it does not matter. Let us return to your obligations."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai esquive le coup avec un petit sourire et recule d'un pas.{/n} « Vous n'auriez pas dû faire une chose pareille. Mais c'est sans importance. Revenons-en plutôt à vos obligations envers moi. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai weicht dem Schlag aus und grinst dabei. Dann zieht er sich zurück.{/n} "Das hättet Ihr nicht tun sollen. Aber es spielt auch keine Rolle. Kommen wir zu Euren Verpflichtungen zurück."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai dodges the blow with a smirk and draws back.{/n} "You should not have done that. But it does not matter. Let us return to your obligations."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai weicht dem Schlag aus und grinst dabei. Dann zieht er sich zurück.{/n} "Das hättet Ihr nicht tun sollen. Aber es spielt auch keine Rolle. Kommen wir zu Euren Verpflichtungen zurück."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai dodges the blow with a smirk and draws back.{/n} "You should not have done that. But it does not matter. Let us return to your obligations."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, sırıtarak darbeden kaçınıp geri çekiliyor.{/n} "Bunu yapmamalıydın. Gerçi önemi yok. Yükümlülüklerine geri dönelim."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai dodges the blow with a smirk and draws back.{/n} "You should not have done that. But it does not matter. Let us return to your obligations."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, sırıtarak darbeden kaçınıp geri çekiliyor.{/n} "Bunu yapmamalıydın. Gerçi hiçbir önemi yok. Yükümlülüklerine geri dönelim."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
